MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your 'default access token' found at the top of https://www.mapbox.com/projects/.

MAPBOX_MAP_ID.description: The ID of the map project you'll use. Found beneath the map's name at https://www.mapbox.com/projects/.

SALESFORCE_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: The Client ID of your Salesforce Connected App (OAuth). https://help.salesforce.com/apex/HTViewHelpDoc?id=connected_app_create.htm

SALESFORCE_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Client Secret of yoru Salesforce Connected App (OAuth). https://help.salesforce.com/apex/HTViewHelpDoc?id=connected_app_create.htm
